title: Out of Nowhere
description: The 96 lyrical poems in this amazing debut collection will enthrall the readers. An excerpt:All we have leftis an unknown futuremy past is nothingbut a confusing shadowthe nature of love was a big debateso was moneythey say there is no endto the misery and fearthat occupy lifeof trying to fathom what went wrongthey ask me to carry onand end beingthe resident philosopherof the worldI have no past, I saythe presentis running awayonly where I donâ€™t know.
author: Colin Andersen
